data.comment: The match has started.
Kevin Friend signals a free kick to Liverpool.
In the minute 3, Ball goes out of play for a West Ham goal kick.
Throw-in for Liverpool in the half of West Ham.
Throw-in for Liverpool close to the penalty box.
In the minute 8, Free kick West Ham.
West Ham have been awarded a corner by Kevin Friend.
Liverpool have a goal kick.
In the minute 10, West Ham take a 0-1 lead thanks to Pablo Fornals.
Throw-in for West Ham in their own half.
Liverpool are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 16, Throw-in for Liverpool at Anfield.
Corner awarded to Liverpool.
Kevin Friend signals a Liverpool throw-in in West Ham's half.
In the minute 21, Can Liverpool capitalize from this throw-in deep inside West Ham's half?
Liverpool awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Liverpool a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 25, Liverpool's Jordan Henderson breaks free at Anfield. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for West Ham at Anfield.
Throw-in Liverpool.
In the minute 27, Liverpool to take a throw-in in West Ham territory.
Kevin Friend awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as West Ham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 30, Ball safe as Liverpool is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for West Ham in their own half.
Liverpool's Sadio Mane is whistled for offside at Anfield.
In the minute 32, Can West Ham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Liverpool's half?
Free kick for Liverpool in the half of West Ham.
Kevin Friend awards Liverpool a goal kick.
In the minute 35, Kevin Friend signals a free kick to West Ham in their own half.
Kevin Friend signals a free kick to Liverpool.
Andrew Robertson of Liverpool gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 37, It's a goal kick for the away team in Liverpool.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Liverpool close to the penalty box.
Trent Alexander-Arnold (Liverpool) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 40, Liverpool have been given a penalty...
Free kick for West Ham in the half of Liverpool.
Mohamed Salah equalizes with a well-taken penalty.
In the minute 43, Free kick West Ham.
West Ham have a goal kick.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, It's a goal kick for the away team in Liverpool.
The first-half is over.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Throw-in Liverpool.
West Ham awarded a free kick in their own half.
Liverpool's Curtis Jones gets in a shot on goal at Anfield. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 49, In Liverpool a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Declan Rice for West Ham has been booked by Kevin Friend and receives a first yellow card.
Mohamed Salah for Liverpool drives towards goal at Anfield. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 50, Pablo Fornals of West Ham smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
West Ham awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 56, Kevin Friend signals a free kick to West Ham in their own half.
Free kick Liverpool.
Throw-in for West Ham in their own half.
In the minute 57, Free kick for West Ham in their own half.
Liverpool needs to be cautious. West Ham have an attacking throw-in.
Kevin Friend signals a Liverpool throw-in in West Ham's half.
In the minute 60, Throw-in for Liverpool at Anfield.
Kevin Friend awards West Ham a goal kick.
Free kick for West Ham in the half of Liverpool.
In the minute 63, Kevin Friend awards the home team a throw-in.
Kevin Friend waits before resuming play because Aaron Cresswell for West Ham is still down.
West Ham's Aaron Cresswell is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 65, Kevin Friend signals a free kick to Liverpool in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a West Ham goal kick.
In Liverpool, Pablo Fornals of West Ham is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 68, Liverpool awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Liverpool get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in West Ham's half?
Liverpool to take a throw-in in West Ham territory.
In the minute 70, The home team replace Curtis Jones with Xherdan Shaqiri.
Kevin Friend signals a free kick to Liverpool just outside West Ham's area.
In the minute 71, Throw-in for Liverpool in the half of West Ham.
Jurgen Klopp (Liverpool) is making a second substitution, with Diogo Jota replacing Roberto Firmino.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Liverpool's Mohamed Salah gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 74, Goal kick for West Ham at Anfield.
Andriy Yarmolenko is replacing Sebastian Haller for West Ham at Anfield.
Free kick for Liverpool in their own half.
In the minute 77, Liverpool pushes forward through Sadio Mane, whose finish on goal is saved.
West Ham awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can West Ham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Liverpool's half?
In the minute 81, West Ham have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Liverpool at Anfield.
Throw-in high up the field for West Ham in Liverpool.
In the minute 85, Goal! Diogo Jota gives Liverpool a 2-1 lead in Liverpool.
Xherdan Shaqiri instrumental with a fine assist.
Free kick for West Ham in their own half.
In the minute 88, Kevin Friend signals a free kick to Liverpool.
In the minute 89, Ball safe as West Ham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
David Moyes is making the team's second substitution at Anfield with Said Benrahma replacing Jarrod Bowen.
The away team have replaced Arthur Masuaku with Manuel Lanzini. This is the third substitution made today by David Moyes.
Kevin Friend will wait an extra 5 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Kevin Friend signals a free kick to Liverpool in their own half.
In Liverpool a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In Liverpool West Ham drive forward through Tomas Soucek. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Kevin Friend signals a Liverpool throw-in in West Ham's half.
West Ham awarded a throw-in in their own half.
West Ham have been awarded a corner by Kevin Friend.
Kevin Friend awards Liverpool a goal kick.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-1.
Jurgen Klopp (Liverpool) is making a third substitution, with James Milner replacing Mohamed Salah.
